text: Alfred Molina (born Alfredo Molina; 24 May 1953) is an English actor. He played Diego Rivera in Frida, Dr. Sayeed Bozorg Mahmoody in Not Without My Daughter, Satipo in Raiders of the Lost Ark, Dr. Octopus in Spider-Man 2 and Spider-Man: No Way Home, and Maxim Horvath in The Sorcerer's Apprentice. Molina was born on 24 May 1953 in Paddington, London, England to an Italian mother and Spanish father. He grew up in Notting Hill, London. He studied at Guildhall School of Music and Drama. Molina was married to actress Jill Gascoine from 1986 until her death in 2020. He has one daughter from another relationship. In 2019, he began dating Jennifer Lee. They were married in 2021. Molina lives in Los Angeles, California. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from London Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:People from the Royal Borough of Kensington and Chelsea Category:People from Paddington
title: Alfred Molina
